content.prompt: The position x of an object is given as a function of time t by the equation x = 8 + 4t - 6t3 , where x is in meters and t is in seconds. What is the maximum positive velocity attained by this object?

choices.label: There is no maximum positive velocity because the object never moves in the positive direction.

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
